name: History clicker
description:
Welcome to History Clicker!

In this game you need to pass the little journey from the first lives to stars. It isn't hard. Just click on Earth and evolve in the big tree of discoveries!

Control:

Just LMB (Left Mouse Button)

Don't forget to read HOW TO PLAY

Developed by:

Programming: https://joplcp.itch.io/
2D Pixel-art: https://captain-grecha.itch.io
